DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates, if the movement of the cervical spine, assessed via a specific questionnaire by the patient, is a valid and reliable tool and could be used in daily clinical routine.
DOC.brief_title: Development of a Self-administered Neck Mobility Assessment Tool in Chronic Neck Pain Patients.
DOC.detailed_description: Cervical range of motion is a frequently used assessment methods in patients with neck pain. Although it seems to be used frequently, clinicians still prefer hands-on assessment. Furthermore it is interesting, if cervical range of motion,self-assessed by the patient is a valid and reliable tool.
DOC.criteria: Neck pain > 90 days Able to speak, read and write German Red Flags e.g. Fracture of the cervical spine
